definition: thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)
to plan to/to draft (a plan)/to imitate/to assess/to compare/pseudo-
doubtful/suspicious/variant of 擬|拟[ni3]/to emulate/to imitate
100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]

sentences.english: The authors suggest a simplified method of significant test for the compatibility of curve fitting.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出一种曲线拟合适度显著性检验的简化法。

sentences.english: This paper presents a curve-fitting method to construct Hash functions.
sentences.chinese: 本文给出一种构造哈希函数的曲线拟合法。

sentences.english: Curve fitting and auto-regression model are common means in deformation monitoring data analysis.
sentences.chinese: 曲线拟合与自回归是变形监测数据分析的常用方法。

sentences.english: Gives a new curve fitting method for non linear sensor.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了非线性传感器的一种曲线拟合方法。

sentences.english: Determine pitch contours by curve fitting.
sentences.chinese: 第二，利用曲线拟合确定调形。

sentences.english: In the area of fitting a curve , the fitting method can trace back to the least-squares method.
sentences.chinese: 对于曲线拟合最早可以追溯到曲线的二乘拟合。

sentences.english: Finally, the backlash slope and the backlash width can be obtained by curve fitting technic.
sentences.chinese: 最后利用曲线拟合的方法可获得间隙的宽度和斜率。

sentences.english: Research and application of a new method of curve fitting.
sentences.chinese: 实验数据的曲线拟合方法及其应用。

sentences.english: By using the curve-fitting method, its analytical expression is obtained.
sentences.chinese: 并以曲线拟合法求得该函数的解析表达式。

sentences.english: The traditional procedure of conic fitting utilizes the standard Eigen Value Decomposition (EVD) algorithm.
sentences.chinese: 传统的二次曲线拟合使用标准特征值分析算法。

sentences.english: Excited state absorption cross sections are obtained through Z-scan curve fitting.
sentences.chinese: 通过曲线拟合，得出了它们的激发态吸收截面。

sentences.english: The characteristic parameters of the curve fitting method are analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 分析了曲线拟合特征参数的计算方法。

sentences.english: The method of using cubic spline function as fan characteristic curve fitting is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了用三次样条函数作通风机性能曲线拟合的方法。

definition: to fit (data to a model)/a (close) fit

pinyin: zui4 da4 si4 ran2 gu1 ji4
